Articles.Content:
Here is an interesting topic you people might find interesting

Today in KSP, i tried building a plane in Realism Overhaul. Problem was, the runway (and all terrain in general) has weird invisible ''bumps'' on it, wich make it nearly impossible for light planes or even rovers to drive or take off normally. And instead of trying to report the bug, and annoy the Devs of that mod again of a version of the game that is already outdated. I decided to go creative and adapt. I had this small flying car that i wanted to try out. I quickly realized that using the runway or terrain is not going to help in any way, and turning it into a full on VTOL would cause more and more frustration. So instead, i decided to use my inner Kerbal Rocket Scientist and so, i attached an SRB under my car. This was a creative yet simple solution to a bug, that did not take up as much time and does not bother anyone at all.

With this, im just saying that one simple thing, can change the way players and people in general and start a butterfly effect. Another example of this is the whole Dres awareness situation and the Dres does not exist conspiracy, the sudden rise of combat players when BDarmory was added, etc.
